about_the_game:
Futa on Male

You're in-between jobs and down on your luck, living at home. Your dad is a wealthy man, out working most of the time, leaving you alone with your bitch of a Stepmom. She busts your balls and is very demeaning towards you.

She's a total bitch, and even your father makes sure to stay on her good side.

One day she decides that she's had enough of you, and assigns you a chore that she deems for in order for you to earn your keep.
However, you could not have anticipated what would happen next, and little did you know, that you were in for the ride of a lifetime.

Read through some pretty raunchy(erotic) dialogue, accompanied by spicy nude depictions.

Gameplay

Kinetic Visual Novel

H-Scenes
~5K words

Immerse yourself in the story by typing in your own name, then proceeding to read through a raunchy story from the first-person perspective.
Get to know your Stepmom on a very intimate level as you read through encounters ranging from platonic, to flirtatious, to downright sexual and experimental, in a naughty kind of way...

content_descriptors.notes:
*All characters in this game are over the age of 21 years old.

- Futanari
- Sexual acts such as oral sex and anal sex(receiving)
- Spanking and Domination(receiving)
- Dirty language
- Dirty jokes
